title: Senior Front-end Developer
description:
As a senior front-end developer, I am responsible for maintaining applications to the highest standards and ensuring stability for our 22,000+ active customers on the platform, enabling them to perform pension calculations and more. Additionally, I oversee the main website, ensuring it achieves the highest levels of SEO and performance. I enhanced the website's performance by 22%, improved SEO by approximately 9%, and implemented good practices, resulting in a 29% enhancement.

My main responsibilities are:

  • Development of new features using Next, HTML, Tailwind CSS, Typescript and React Hooks;
  • Implementation of SEO techniques using Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager;
  • Bug fixes
  • Code refactoring
  • Architecture planning

positions.title: Senior Front-end Developer
positions.description:
As the Lead Software Engineer, I spearheaded the development of the Conquer Plus Platform, a project that has significantly impacted over 2 million customers globally by issuing more than 1 million certificates. My role was pivotal in every phase of the platform's lifecycle, from the initial planning stages to the selection of cutting-edge technologies and the architecture of the entire system.

  • Public Speaking: Delivered insightful presentations on key technical topics, establishing thought leadership within and beyond the team.
  • Team Support: Provided ongoing support and mentorship to team members, enhancing team cohesion and individual skill levels.
  • Content Creation: Authored engaging programming course content, contributing to the development and dissemination of technical knowledge.
  • Development and Training: Spearheaded the upskilling of team members in both technical and soft skills, fostering a collaborative and high-performing team environment.
  • Feature Development: Led the design and implementation of new features, significantly enhancing platform functionality and user experience.
  • Bug Fixes: Directed effective bug resolution efforts, substantially improving software reliability and performance.

title: Co-Founder and Senior Front-end developer
description:
As company partner and front-end developer, my objectives are giving the best of usability, performance and code. Make companies life easier is our goal, and growing with quality is out focus.

My main objectives were:

  • Create the platform and implement features using React, Tailwind CSS, Typescript and Storybook

title: Mobile Developer
description:
I acted as the main developer of the DoBank app during the time I was present at the company. It's made in React Native and we use the latest tech options to ensure the best security, experience and usability for the user. We consume the API using GraphQL and a few more things. The main points of this activity are:

  • Development of features in the app
  • Screen development
  • API consumption with GraphQL
